mapper.sql: ID, SYS_ID, SYS_NAME, HOME_ADDRESS, SYS_ABBREVIATIONS, SYS_ICON, IS_AVAILABLE

sys.ID as "id", sys.SYS_ID as "sysId", sys.SYS_NAME as "sysName", sys.HOME_ADDRESS as "homeAddress", sys.SYS_ABBREVIATIONS as "sysAbbreviations", sys.SYS_ICON as "sysIcon", sys.IS_AVAILABLE as "isAvailable", dict.value as "isAvailableCn"
mapper.insert: insert into system_info (ID, SYS_ID, SYS_NAME, HOME_ADDRESS, SYS_ABBREVIATIONS, SYS_ICON, IS_AVAILABLE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysAbbreviations,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into system_info
ID,
SYS_ID,
SYS_NAME,
HOME_ADDRESS,
SYS_ABBREVIATIONS,
SYS_ICON,
IS_AVAILABLE,

mapper.update:
update system_info
SYS_ID = #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_NAME = #{sysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOME_ADDRESS = #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_ABBREVIATIONS = #{sysAbbreviations,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_ICON = #{sysIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_AVAILABLE = #{isAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update system_info set SYS_ID = #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_NAME = #{sysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOME_ADDRESS = #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_ABBREVIATIONS = #{sysAbbreviations,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_ICON = #{sysIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_AVAILABLE = #{isAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from system_info sys left join sys_dictionary dict on dict.TYPE = 'YES_NO' and dict.`KEY` = sys.IS_AVAILABLE
sys.SYS_ID like '%' || #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
sys.SYS_ABBREVIATIONS like '%' || #{sysAbbreviations,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
sys.SYS_NAME like '%' || #{sysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
order by sys.id limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) from system_info sys left join sys_dictionary dict on dict.TYPE = 'YES_NO' and dict.`KEY` = sys.IS_AVAILABLE
sys.SYS_ID like '%' || #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
sys.SYS_ABBREVIATIONS like '%' || #{sysAbbreviations,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
sys.SYS_NAME like '%' || #{sysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
